name: Satmojis
description: Satmojis is an open-supply CC0 collection of animated emoji sticker pack inscribed directly onto Bitcoin via Ordinals. Extremely lean 500 byte hand-drawn fine art GIFs which serve as a decentralized emoticon or reaction GIF library accessible permissionlessly via recursion. They are also indexed across all web2 apps via the artist, AKLO's verified GIPHY & TENOR accounts which power the gif libraries of Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Telegram, Discord & more. AKLO has been a verified GIF artist on GIPHY & Tenor since 2012 where he has over 200 Million views. Est. 2023 by PxPushers
